common.intro: Hello, I am a professional Marketeer based in Barcelona!

about-me.intro: Digital Marketing craftsman: Web development and accessibility, design, SEO / SEM. I'm a passionate about technology and the power it has over people, for this reason, I think in the continuous learning as philosophy, the creation of exclusive experiences to the users and the world transformation through technology. As Marketing Manager in a leading consultancy in the insurance mediation sector nationwide I have been part and responsible for all projects for clients nationwide.

aboutme.title: About Me - Things I like to do:

bio.ondigital-job: I started working in various insurance companies, mostly administrative positions.
bio.tech-job: I worked in various technology companies.
bio.solvento-job: Head of the MKT department at Solvento Consulting as Marketing Manager.

solvento.title: Solvento Consulting
solvento.copy: Solvento Consulting is a company that offers the best solutions for your business. I've been working with them for a while now as Marketing Manager.

cafesalvador.title: Salvador's Coffee Shop
cafesalvador.copy: Long known Coffee Shop in Barcelona, I've designed their website and re-branding.

sanitas.title: Sanitas
sanitas.copy: Worked as Marketing Assistant in the Marketing Department, a leading health insurance company in Spain.

msi.title: MSI
msi.copy: Did an internship in the Marketing Department of MSI, a leading company in the gaming sector.

collabs.title: Collabs
collabs.copy: Besides working on my own projects, I also collaborate with other companies and individuals. Here are some of the projects I've worked on.
collabs.zwheel: Helped boosting the e-commerce sales of the company.
collabs.onlylens: I've created scrappers for their e-commerce.
collabs.cdm: Developed and designed the website of this amazing YouTuber.

404.title: 404 | Not Found
404.message: Hey, looks like you're lost, don't worry, I'm here to help you find your way back home.
